messages.title: Today is polling day
messages.content: Today is polling day in Stoke-on-Trent Central. Your vote could be the difference between a Local Labour MP standing up for our city and fighting for you and your family or the Conservative candidate shipped in from Kent, simply doing whatever Boris Johnson tells them to.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: I'll Fight the Tory Retirement Age Increase
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Tories want to raise the retirement age to 75, remove the triple lock on pensions & create a dementia tax. As your MP I'll always fight these plans.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivering a Brexit That Works for Us
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll continue to fight for a managed Brexit that respects the referendum result but doesn't damage our manufacturing industries.
I'll continue to stand up against Tory cuts to our NHS and school budgets. I'll never support Tory plans to sell off our public services to the highest bidder.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: To Continue to Be an Accessible MP
keyPolicies.policyDescription: In two years I've held hundreds of coffee mornings, surgeries and public meetings. My office will always remain open to offer help and support at all times.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: To Fight for the Jobs & Investment We Need
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need high skilled & well paid jobs. I helped lead the campaign to bring Channel 4 here. I'm never going to stop trying to bring new investment into the Potteries.
